name: seascape
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a view of the sea or a work of art that represents this: This seascape has been shaped by centuries of fierce storms. The area was the inspiration for some of the seascapes of Impressionist painter Claude Monet.
More examplesFewer examplesThe artist's inspiration was the cliffs and seascapes of the northeast of England.The seascape includes enormous mud volcanoes and pools of boiling sulphur.What a tempestuous seascape she made of the first movement.
